itBrainiacs.muffins
Class DataBookFactory

java.lang.Object
  itBrainiacs.muffins.DataBookFactory

public class DataBookFactory
extends Object

Class for handling the conversion between DataBooks and JSONObjects in both directions. Also contains methods for searching Libris for books based on ISBN and returns matching DataBooks.

Constructor Summary

          Static method for parsing json string from Libris to a DataBook object.
static DataBook searchLibris(String isbn)

Method Detail

jsonToDataBooks

public static LinkedList<DataBook> jsonToDataBooks(JSONArray jsonArray)
Static method returning a List of all the books contained in a JSONObject as DataBooks.

Parameters:
jsonArray - the JSONArray to be parsed
Returns:
LinkedList with the books in the search results. Empty list if the JSONObject doesn't contain any books

dataBookToJSON

public static JSONObject dataBookToJSON(DataBook book)
Static method returning a JSONObject of a DataBook.

Parameters:
book - string book to be parsed to json
Returns:
JSONObject representation of book.

searchLibris

public static DataBook searchLibris(String isbn)
Static method for searching libris for specified ISBN, returns DataBook object.

Parameters:
isbn - string isbn number
Returns:
DataBook with the book in the search results.

parseLibris

public static DataBook parseLibris(String json)
Static method for parsing json string from Libris to a DataBook object.

Parameters:
json - string json to be parsed
Returns:
DataBook object with title, creater, publisher, date & language
